attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its all very well sitting in an office Mr/Mrs Education Minister, deciding how to improve our education system, however, this cannot possibly give you an insight into what really "goes on". Try working for a month as a teacher/supply teacher to give you a taste of what the reality is then return to your office and scrap your plans, draw up and implement procedures to support the TEACHERS who are responsible for our childrens futures.  You may LEARN a great deal yourself, in particular, why so many teachers leave the profession after such a short time!

rejection.details: Please redraft with a main sentence that requests an action from HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
